1.text: Flip the hoodie backwards and upside down.

2.text: Cross the arms across the back.

3.text: Fold the hoodie in half horizontally.

4.text: Fold the hoodie vertically into quarters, creating a square.

5.text: Tuck the hood over the rest of the hoodie.

6.text: Lay the hoodie down on a table.

7.text: Fold the hoodie sides towards the center.

8.text: Fold the sleeves in half horizontally over the sides.

9.text: Fold the hood down over the jacket's seam line.

10.text: Section the hoodie into thirds and fold it a final time.

11.text: Stack basic folded hoodies in your closet or shelves.

12.text: Organize KonMari folded hoodies vertically in a drawer.

13.text: Dedicate a specific area in your closet to hoodie storage.
